meaningMnemonic: This is <kanji>equal</kanji> and that is <kanji>equal</kanji>. They're both the same, amazing! They carry <vocabulary>equality</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>uniformity</vocabulary>,  and <vocabulary>evenness</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
